reviewText: I love it, but I wish Doug include the technique on how to do the job on big client. For an asian therapist it kind of tough!

I remember some of these assessment techniques from massage school but how can we possibly remember everything. The video sparked my memory of the most efficient way of approaching these difficult low back and hip pain symptoms. If I would have watched this earlier I am sure that I would have helped more people recover from their chronic pain faster.

Thanks for such a great video!

I ordered this DVD after receiving the upper extremity mobilization DVD and reviewing it.
Initially, I was a little perturbed that the teaching format was a little different from the upper extremity, but after seeing it all, it makes a lot of sense.
Doug presents the information thoroughly and clear.
This is the first time I bought an instructional video and I am very pleased with the knowledge I gained and have been able to apply.
